==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements ArrayBlockingQueue ^D34fOHsu 获取可重入锁 ^h20THk0r E ^sMYGxJE3 E ^dzTjrjdP E ^VUI5Z60Z 入队 ^enuxeCLZ put(E) ^a2QnPHwB 出队 ^Su0qNSQf take() ^nh2vkAQd 获取可重入锁 ^IrV6RtZX 队列已满时阻塞等待 ^iDmLmpOM E ^MQPZumf1 E ^SwzznZ2j E ^ZG0NsZnA 队列为空时阻塞等待 ^5ODiO4kX %% Drawing { "type": "excalidraw", "version": 2, "source": "https://github.com/zsviczian/obsidian-excalidraw-plugin/releases/tag/2.0.25", "elements": [ { "type": "rectangle", "version": 390, "versionNonce": 1075668358, "isDeleted": false, "id": "NO8y5y4ZiKMrRBTv5uRHf", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -400, "y": -800, "strokeColor": "#f08c00", "backgroundColor": "#ffec99", "width": 100, "height": 40, "seed": 1184870874, "groupIds": [ "Y4MeJO0jTIt-6S5Hme7Wu" ], "frameId": null, "roundness": null, "boundElements": [ { "id": "T9Lfgq-8bByOD1_Mn9UrU", "type": "arrow" }, { "type": "text", "id": "a2QnPHwB" } ], "updated": 1713682136578, "link": null, "locked": false }, { "type": "text", "version": 162, "versionNonce": 1727667674, "isDeleted": false, "id": "a2QnPHwB", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -380.

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements 线程A ^2qTJDx9k 共享资源 volatile num = 3 ^LvbRpQEP 比较 Compare ^yzb5BkqC 交换 swap ^ZWYzfBIW 主存 ^dEG3fZZ8 获取 资源 ^VrwxvZA2 预期值：3 真实值：3 ^ggNwXGm5 CAS过程是原子的 ^fsat6yoQ 修改 num = 4 ^fQRDsSFT 线程B ^v2pwYf9f 比较 Compare ^chZKXhtb 交换 swap ^axbOkDyM 预期值：3 真实值：4 ^WuZu0rPr 获取 资源 ^aOr4xG4z 共享资源 volatile num = 4 ^KtdgYddT 重新 获取 资源 ^6tLThhKr %%

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements void taskF() ^a2QnPHwB 耗3秒 ^UakMCz6o 准备6个任务方法 ^B9Oy7sBx String taskB() ^eRDio6D4 String taskC() ^C9poGHbt void taskE() ^HrEECLdn void taskD() ^8TeeVJ5C 耗2秒 ^ATcyKYuR 耗3秒 ^WyGiwdx9 耗1秒 ^ZpNHKSjb 耗2秒 ^LuOKHA0W 耗1秒 ^vNRO3u40 String taskA() ^N8KB0MeI 每个调用均返回一个 Future 实例 ComplateableFuture.runAsync(this::taskD) ComplateableFuture.runAsync(this::taskE) ComplateableFuture.runAsync(this::taskF) ^3gsfrD17 异步调用3个无返回值的任务方法 ^z6g17Eqm CompletableFuture.allOf(fA, fB, fC, fD, fE, fF) ^nfoGUGQi 每个调用均返回一个 Future 实例 ComplateableFuture.supplyAsync(this::taskA) ComplateableFuture.supplyAsync(this::taskB) ComplateableFuture.supplyAsync(this::taskC) ^wJlCGwQz

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements ConcurrentLinkedQueue ^D34fOHsu CAS出队，保证安全 ^h20THk0r Node(E) ^sMYGxJE3 Node(E) ^dzTjrjdP Node(E) ^VUI5Z60Z 入队 ^enuxeCLZ add(E) ^a2QnPHwB 出队 ^Su0qNSQf poll() ^nh2vkAQd 创建新节点Node(E) ^UakMCz6o CAS入队，保证安全 ^IrV6RtZX 队列为空时直接返回null ^iDmLmpOM %% Drawing { "type": "excalidraw", "version": 2, "source": "https://github.com/zsviczian/obsidian-excalidraw-plugin/releases/tag/2.0.25", "elements": [ { "type": "rectangle", "version": 386, "versionNonce": 1422769030, "isDeleted": false, "id": "NO8y5y4ZiKMrRBTv5uRHf", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -400, "y": -800, "strokeColor": "#f08c00", "backgroundColor": "#ffec99", "width": 100, "height": 40, "seed": 1184870874, "groupIds": [ "O8IrQr8wIGjGha06Bs8i3" ], "frameId": null, "roundness": null, "boundElements": [ { "id": "T9Lfgq-8bByOD1_Mn9UrU", "type": "arrow" }, { "type": "text", "id": "a2QnPHwB" } ], "updated": 1713594261499, "link": null, "locked": false }, { "type": "text", "version": 155, "versionNonce": 1956784090, "isDeleted": false, "id": "a2QnPHwB", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -382.

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements 线程98 ^WjWjU1tG await() ^Y981JvbI await() ^p93xAK3F 线程11 ^VIFWaBL4 线程12 ^fJD7blw9 线程13 ^i2VSGpvv await() ^G9Q7xxLc 线程97 ^eBo40W9K await() ^NqNp3XCP CyclicBarrier(3) ^D34fOHsu await() ^rLhjcRs0 资源 ^ZNePuoyq await() ^0IfcwhyW 线程01 ^h20THk0r 线程02 ^tbEhULnG 线程03 ^SGofBPu4 await() ^arQbAsxW await() ^hd6qiskj 第二批 放行3个 ^pbeacwk5 第一批 放行3个 ^WXdtVTdz %% Drawing { "type": "excalidraw", "version": 2, "source": "https://github.com/zsviczian/obsidian-excalidraw-plugin/releases/tag/2.0.25", "elements": [ { "type": "arrow", "version": 2043, "versionNonce": 131723806, "isDeleted": false, "id": "Ojkartur46M6hP-m-mooL", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -299.

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements DelayQueue ^D34fOHsu 队列为空时阻塞等待 ^h20THk0r 队列内部会根据延迟时间戳进行排序 ^sMYGxJE3 put(E) ^a2QnPHwB 出队 ^Su0qNSQf take() ^nh2vkAQd 获取可重入锁 ^UakMCz6o 仅支持存储 Delayed 接口的实现类，且存储时需要设置延迟时间戳 ^DKPqvImy 获取可重入锁 ^6ytEMycW 入队 ^l2NbJYO2 %% Drawing { "type": "excalidraw", "version": 2, "source": "https://github.com/zsviczian/obsidian-excalidraw-plugin/releases/tag/2.0.25", "elements": [ { "type": "rectangle", "version": 390, "versionNonce": 1683243590, "isDeleted": false, "id": "NO8y5y4ZiKMrRBTv5uRHf", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -400, "y": -800, "strokeColor": "#f08c00", "backgroundColor": "#ffec99", "width": 100, "height": 40, "seed": 1184870874, "groupIds": [ "kp1RAGMf12-mkfS7UPn1f" ], "frameId": null, "roundness": null, "boundElements": [ { "type": "text", "id": "a2QnPHwB" }, { "id": "TDH5S2yXg24AdrfqoYifX", "type": "arrow" } ], "updated": 1713598072465, "link": null, "locked": false }, { "type": "text", "version": 164, "versionNonce": 1807510810, "isDeleted": false, "id": "a2QnPHwB", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -380.

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements exchanger(" 面包 “) ^arQbAsxW 线程 01 ^tQGWiKih 线程02 ^lcsWFdSD Exchanger ^xyZ8XNI4 攒够两个 exchange() ^HQ8dprlh 返回 “10元” ^tFX7sylE 开始交换数据 ^gxa56jBo exchanger(” 10元 “) ^8FcDDgOc 返回 “面包” ^wz9W3GFJ %% Drawing { "type": "excalidraw", "version": 2, "source": "https://github.com/zsviczian/obsidian-excalidraw-plugin/releases/tag/2.0.25", "elements": [ { "type": "rectangle", "version": 425, "versionNonce": 155367042, "isDeleted": false, "id": "Yfkml9ZdwA5p-Sb-5qbWi", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -300, "y": -1000, "strokeColor": "#f08c00", "backgroundColor": "#ffec99", "width": 40, "height": 200, "seed": 511417502, "groupIds": [ "u2FVUxwbm4BN3dY0ZAGIC" ], "frameId": null, "roundness": null, "boundElements": [ { "type": "text", "id": "tQGWiKih" }, { "id": "caFnoNqGLlLo8x1igf87B", "type": "arrow" }, { "id": "48OZMXUoCiWf_oPaohaQo", "type": "arrow" } ], "updated": 1713082677314, "link": null, "locked": false }, { "type": "text", "version": 181, "versionNonce": 709585566, "isDeleted": false, "id": "tQGWiKih", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -290, "y": -937.

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements LinkedBlockingDeque ^D34fOHsu 队列为空时阻塞等待 ^h20THk0r Node(E) ^sMYGxJE3 Node(E) ^dzTjrjdP Node(E) ^VUI5Z60Z takeFirst(E) ^a2QnPHwB 出队 ^Su0qNSQf takeLast() ^nh2vkAQd 获取可重入锁 ^UakMCz6o 创建新节点Node(E) ^DKPqvImy 获取可重入锁 ^6ytEMycW 出队 ^l2NbJYO2 addFirst(E) ^AnYpLIqI 入队 ^XXQcsjnZ addLast() ^o1nICsC5 入队 ^pWdaHism %% Drawing { "type": "excalidraw", "version": 2, "source": "https://github.com/zsviczian/obsidian-excalidraw-plugin/releases/tag/2.0.25", "elements": [ { "type": "rectangle", "version": 403, "versionNonce": 7748506, "isDeleted": false, "id": "DTr2poJZ37xwOwO4FxZJo", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -400, "y": -840, "strokeColor": "#f08c00", "backgroundColor": "#ffec99", "width": 120, "height": 40, "seed": 1516086662, "groupIds": [ "u7atYc3fmidYuMjuNON3N" ], "frameId": null, "roundness": null, "boundElements": [ { "id": "-2g6OGlk7hYQtEUAXC1Sx", "type": "arrow" }, { "type": "text", "id": "AnYpLIqI" } ], "updated": 1713595236029, "link": null, "locked": false }, { "type": "text", "version": 187, "versionNonce": 365978374, "isDeleted": false, "id": "AnYpLIqI", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -384.

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements LinkedBlockingQueue ^D34fOHsu 队列为空时阻塞等待 ^h20THk0r Node(E) ^sMYGxJE3 Node(E) ^dzTjrjdP Node(E) ^VUI5Z60Z put(E) ^a2QnPHwB 出队 ^Su0qNSQf take() ^nh2vkAQd 获取 putLock 锁 ^UakMCz6o 创建新节点Node(E) ^DKPqvImy 获取 takeLock 锁 ^6ytEMycW 入队 ^l2NbJYO2 %% Drawing { "type": "excalidraw", "version": 2, "source": "https://github.com/zsviczian/obsidian-excalidraw-plugin/releases/tag/2.0.25", "elements": [ { "type": "rectangle", "version": 388, "versionNonce": 112834586, "isDeleted": false, "id": "NO8y5y4ZiKMrRBTv5uRHf", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -400, "y": -800, "strokeColor": "#f08c00", "backgroundColor": "#ffec99", "width": 100, "height": 40, "seed": 1184870874, "groupIds": [ "vP_ERt4u8krVa0dBq24Vs" ], "frameId": null, "roundness": null, "boundElements": [ { "type": "text", "id": "a2QnPHwB" }, { "id": "TDH5S2yXg24AdrfqoYifX", "type": "arrow" } ], "updated": 1713594173825, "link": null, "locked": false }, { "type": "text", "version": 162, "versionNonce": 619769478, "isDeleted": false, "id": "a2QnPHwB", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -380.

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements LinkedTransferQueue ^D34fOHsu 若队列不为空 直接获取队列头 ^h20THk0r Node(E) ^sMYGxJE3 Node(E) ^dzTjrjdP null ^VUI5Z60Z put(E) ^a2QnPHwB 出队 ^Su0qNSQf take() ^nh2vkAQd 若队列中存在null节点 则直接将数据填充到该节点中 并 notify() 该节点上的线程 ^UakMCz6o 若队列中不存在null节点 则创建新节点Node(E) ^DKPqvImy 若队列为空 在队列中留一个null节点 并使当前线程在该节点上 wait() ^6ytEMycW 入队 ^l2NbJYO2 %% Drawing { "type": "excalidraw", "version": 2, "source": "https://github.com/zsviczian/obsidian-excalidraw-plugin/releases/tag/2.0.25", "elements": [ { "type": "rectangle", "version": 390, "versionNonce": 1217081670, "isDeleted": false, "id": "NO8y5y4ZiKMrRBTv5uRHf", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -400, "y": -800, "strokeColor": "#f08c00", "backgroundColor": "#ffec99", "width": 100, "height": 40, "seed": 1184870874, "groupIds": [ "wduy2qz9TjLdjjih4Wl81" ], "frameId": null, "roundness": null, "boundElements": [ { "type": "text", "id": "a2QnPHwB" }, { "id": "TDH5S2yXg24AdrfqoYifX", "type": "arrow" } ], "updated": 1713597181290, "link": null, "locked": false }, { "type": "text", "version": 164, "versionNonce": 1039134234, "isDeleted": false, "id": "a2QnPHwB", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -380.

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements unpark(线程01) ^QWKBDMwS 线程99 ^Xc2Af7jL 等待队列 ^o3ermnMd 线程01 ^GytHnaMR 线程02 ^SPn2RM5B 线程03 ^bhN6YeJh 线程99 ^n8Gr2kqr 其他线程 ^BdecUV7R park() ^6dFzZh3z %% Drawing { "type": "excalidraw", "version": 2, "source": "https://github.com/zsviczian/obsidian-excalidraw-plugin/releases/tag/2.0.25", "elements": [ { "type": "rectangle", "version": 339, "versionNonce": 833884994, "isDeleted": false, "id": "pUlmvZBzMHw0CjZaYNjYb", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "dotted", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -400, "y": -600, "strokeColor": "#f08c00", "backgroundColor": "#ffec99", "width": 100, "height": 35, "seed": 1467050306, "groupIds": [ "fhswVm-AuLC_tz-hR18wl" ], "frameId": null, "roundness": null, "boundElements": [ { "type": "text", "id": "Xc2Af7jL" }, { "id": "Zm6inINLWYuI81dXY2jjc", "type": "arrow" } ], "updated": 1713079483472, "link": null, "locked": false }, { "type": "text", "version": 139, "versionNonce": 29047262, "isDeleted": false, "id": "Xc2Af7jL", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2, "strokeStyle": "solid", "roughness": 1, "opacity": 100, "angle": 0, "x": -382.

==⚠ Switch to EXCALIDRAW VIEW in the MORE OPTIONS menu of this document. ⚠== Text Elements 线程04 ^h20THk0r 线程05 ^tbEhULnG 线程06 ^SGofBPu4 onAdvance(0,6) ^Zb9q2oU4 onAdvance(1,4) ^qGKBcmhc onAdvance(2,2) ^kfGEuDS3 线程01 ^vRrpNeXl 线程02 ^HG0G6cbF 线程03 ^MRrEqcwD 阶段 1 ^nQra9M1O 淘汰 2 ^HEKAR52s 阶段 0 ^xOWRf3Re 淘汰 2 ^dWN8Sk7P 阶段 2 ^ZG1Xslm3 淘汰 2 ^kXikYR0f bulkRegister(6) ^0NwC5jMh Phaser ^OatgPqAk arriveAndAwaitAdvance() ^otRnaNgu 存活 6 ^wL74GZ4L 存活 4 ^2SDGKOed 存活 2 ^63rZCSIT 全部线程 均被淘汰 ^YUzfTIRA
